name: Pro Fishing Challenge VR
description:
The first fishing game powered by Touch controllers!

Pro Fishing Challenge VR delivers an amazing and immersive fishing experience using the Touch controllers, an online multiplayer mode supporting voice chat to play with or against
your friends and players from around the world.

Grab your rod, cast your lure, and catch a fish using your own hands. In this virtual world, you'll feel like you're fishing in the real world. Cast, reel, and hook the fish as if you were actually fishing. Earn XP and money and get better equipment from the angler shop to rise to the top of the leaderboards.

In the online multiplayer mode, you can meet and talk with other players in real time. Enjoy sharing your best fishing tactics and hang out with your friends while fishing together.

Let's go fishing!
